select notice_id as noticeId, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_date as noticeDate from notice order by notice_date desc limit #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title noticeTitle, notice_content noticeContent, notice_date noticeDate FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( notice_title, notice_content, notice_date ) values ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, now() )
